BC_SEQ_100812561061661921113111.BIZ_COLLECTION_KOR_NAME: 코인 차트 데이터 요청(일별 이평선 추이)

chart.SERVICE_NAME:
Select A.code, A.date, A.time, A.date_time, A.slope1, B.slope2, C.slope3, D.slope4, E.slope5, F.slope6
, A.slope_of_slope_min_ma5
, B.slope_of_slope_min_ma10
, C.slope_of_slope_min_ma15
, D.slope_of_slope_min_ma20
, E.slope_of_slope_min_ma50
, F.close
From ( select code, date, time, date_time , value/m*100 as slope1 , value as slope_of_slope_min_ma5
From(
Select code, date, time, date_time , value, (select max(value) from coin_slope_stats where code = ? and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma5' and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') ) as m
From coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma5'
and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S')
) A1 ) A,
(select code, date, time, date_time , value/m*100 as slope2 , value as slope_of_slope_min_ma10
From(
Select code, date, time, date_time , value, (select max(value) from coin_slope_stats where code = ? and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma10' and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') ) as m
From coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma10'
and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S')
) B1 ) B,
(select code, date, time, date_time , value/m*100 as slope3 , value as slope_of_slope_min_ma15
From(
Select code, date, time, date_time , value, (select max(value) from coin_slope_stats where code = ? and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma15' and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') ) as m
From coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma15'
and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S')
) C1 ) C,
(select code, date, time, date_time , value/m*100 as slope4 , value as slope_of_slope_min_ma20
From(
Select code, date, time, date_time , value, (select max(value) from coin_slope_stats where code = ? and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma20' and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') ) as m
From coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma20'
and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S')
) D1 ) D,
(select code, date, time, date_time , value/m*100 as slope5, value as slope_of_slope_min_ma50
From(
Select code, date, time, date_time , value, (select max(value) from coin_slope_stats where code = ? and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma50' and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') ) as m
From coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and name = 'slope_of_slope_min_ma50'
and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S')
) E1 ) E,
(select code, date, time, date_time , value/m*100 as slope6, value as close
From(
Select code, date, time, date_time , value, (select max(value) from coin_slope_stats where code = ? and name = 'close' and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') ) as m
From coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and name = 'close'
and date_time >= date_format(date_add(now(),interval -2 hour), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S')
) F1 ) F
Where A.date_time = B.date_time
And B.date_time = C.date_time
And C.date_time = D.date_time
And D.date_time = E.date_time
And E.date_time = F.date_time
Order By A.date_time
